name: Star Trek Online Forums - Custom Style
description:
Don't like the changes made to the forums?  Problem solved :)
Browse on a small-resolution monitor and hate how everything is off your screen if you don't scroll?  Problem solved :)
Background image? Gone!
Massive header?  Gone!
Indistinct Section Headers? Underlined so that they are more distinct!
